00055   template<class Scalar> 
00056   class Space: public Writeable {
00057 
00059     typedef typename ScalarFieldTraits<Scalar>::AbsType NormRetType;
00060 
00061   protected:
00062 
00079 #ifndef RVL_OPERATOR_NEW_ENABLED
00080     void * operator new(size_t size) { 
00081       void * ptr;
00082       ptr = (void *) ::new unsigned char[size]; 
00083       return ptr;
00084     }
00085 #endif
00086 
00087   public:
00088 
00089     Space() {}
00090     Space(const Space<Scalar> & sp) {}
00091     virtual ~Space(){}
00092 
00097     virtual DataContainer * buildDataContainer() const  = 0;
00098 
00101     virtual bool operator ==(const Space<Scalar> & sp) const = 0;
00102     bool operator !=(const Space<Scalar> & sp) const {
00103       try {
00104     return !operator==(sp);
00105       }
00106       catch (RVLException & e) {
00107     e<<"\ncalled from Space::operator!=\n";
00108     throw e;
00109       }
00110     }
00111 
00114     virtual bool isCompatible(DataContainer const & dc) const = 0;
00115 
00119     virtual Scalar inner(DataContainer const & x, 
00120              DataContainer const & y) const = 0;
00121 
00123     virtual void zero(DataContainer & x) const = 0;
00124 
00128     virtual void linComb(Scalar a, DataContainer const & x,
00129              Scalar b, DataContainer & y) const = 0;
00130 
00137     virtual void copy(DataContainer & tgt, DataContainer const & src) const {
00138       try {
00139     Scalar one = ScalarFieldTraits<Scalar>::One();
00140     Scalar zip = ScalarFieldTraits<Scalar>::Zero();
00141     linComb(one,src,zip,tgt);
00142       }
00143       catch (RVLException & e) {
00144     e<<"\ncalled fom Space::copy\n";
00145     throw e;
00146       }
00147     }
00148 
00154     virtual void negate(DataContainer & tgt) const {
00155       try {
00156     DataContainer const * jnk = this->buildDataContainer();
00157     Scalar zip = ScalarFieldTraits<Scalar>::Zero();
00158     Scalar one = ScalarFieldTraits<Scalar>::One();
00159     linComb(zip,*jnk,-one,tgt);
00160     delete jnk;
00161       }
00162       catch (RVLException & e) {
00163     e<<"\ncalled fom Space::negate\n";
00164     throw e;
00165       }
00166     }
00167 
00169     virtual void negate(DataContainer & tgt,
00170             DataContainer const & src) const {
00171       try {
00172     Scalar one = ScalarFieldTraits<Scalar>::One();
00173     Scalar zip = ScalarFieldTraits<Scalar>::Zero();
00174     linComb(-one,src,zip,tgt);
00175       }
00176       catch (RVLException & e) {
00177     e<<"\ncalled fom Space::negate\n";
00178     throw e;
00179       }
00180     }
00181 
00187     virtual void scale(DataContainer & tgt,
00188                Scalar c) const {
00189       try {
00190     DataContainer * jnk = this->buildDataContainer();
00191     zero(*jnk);
00192     Scalar zip = ScalarFieldTraits<Scalar>::Zero();
00193     linComb(zip,*jnk,c,tgt);
00194     delete jnk;
00195       }
00196       catch (RVLException & e) {
00197     e<<"\ncalled fom Space::scale\n";
00198     throw e;
00199       }
00200     }
00201 
00203     virtual void scale(DataContainer & tgt,
00204                Scalar c,
00205                DataContainer const & src) const {
00206       try {
00207     Scalar zip = ScalarFieldTraits<Scalar>::Zero();
00208     linComb(c,src,zip,tgt);
00209       }
00210       catch (RVLException & e) {
00211     e<<"\ncalled fom Space::scale\n";
00212     throw e;
00213       }
00214     }
00215 
00218     NormRetType normsq(DataContainer const & x) const {
00219       try {
00220     return abs(inner(x,x));
00221       }
00222       catch (RVLException & e) {
00223     e<<"\n*** called from Space::normsq\n";
00224     throw e;
00225       }
00226     }
00227 
00229     NormRetType norm(DataContainer const & x) const {
00230       try {
00231     NormRetType f=normsq(x);
00232     return (NormRetType) sqrt(f);
00233       }
00234       catch (RVLException & e) {
00235     e<<"\n*** called from Space::norm\n";
00236     throw e;
00237       }
00238     }
00239 
00240   };

00263   template<class Scalar, class DataType = Scalar> 
00264   class StdSpace: public Space<Scalar> {
00265 
00266   public:
00267 
00268     StdSpace() {}
00269     StdSpace(const StdSpace<Scalar, DataType> & sp) {}
00270     virtual ~StdSpace(){}
00271 
00273     virtual  DataContainerFactory const & getDCF() const = 0;
00275     virtual  LinearAlgebraPackage<Scalar> const & getLAP() const = 0;
00276 
00277     // default virtual data container constructor
00278     DataContainer * 
00279     buildDataContainer() const { return getDCF().build(); }
00280 
00285     bool operator ==(const Space<Scalar> & sp) const {
00286       try {
00287     if (this == &sp) return true;
00288     const StdSpace<Scalar, DataType> & stdsp = 
00289       dynamic_cast<const StdSpace<Scalar, DataType> &>(sp);
00290     return (getDCF().compare(stdsp.getDCF()) && 
00291         getLAP().compare(stdsp.getLAP()));
00292       }
00293       catch (bad_cast) {
00294     return 0;
00295       }
00296     }
00297 
00298     // detect compatibility with data container
00299     bool isCompatible(DataContainer const & dc) const {
00300       return getDCF().isCompatible(dc);
00301     }
00302 
00303     // inner product
00304     Scalar inner(DataContainer const & x, 
00305          DataContainer const & y) const {
00306       try {
00307     getLAP().inner().setValue();
00308     vector<DataContainer const *> vy(1);
00309     vy[0]=&y;
00310     x.eval(getLAP().inner(),vy);
00311     return getLAP().inner().getValue();
00312       }
00313       catch (RVLException & e) {
00314     e<<"\ncalled from Space::inner\n";
00315     throw e;
00316       }
00317     }
00318 
00319     // zero vector
00320     void zero(DataContainer & x) const {
00321       try {
00322     vector<DataContainer const *> vy(0);
00323     x.eval(getLAP().zero(),vy);
00324       }
00325       catch (RVLException & e) {
00326     e<<"\ncalled from StdSpace::zero\n";
00327     throw e;
00328       }
00329     }
00330 
00331     // linear combination
00332     void linComb(Scalar a, DataContainer const & x,
00333          Scalar b, DataContainer & y) const {
00334       (getLAP().linComb()).setScalar(a,b);
00335       try {
00336     vector<DataContainer const *> vx(1);
00337     vx[0]=&x;
00338     y.eval(getLAP().linComb(),vx);
00339       }
00340       catch (RVLException & e) {
00341     e<<"\ncalled from StdSpace::linComb\n";
00342     throw e;
00343       }
00344     }
00345 
00346     ostream & write(ostream & str) const {
00347       str<<"StdSpace defined by DataContainerFactory\n";
00348       getDCF().write(str);
00349       str<<"and LinearAlgebraPackage\n";
00350       getLAP().write(str);
00351       return str;
00352     }
00353   };

00359   template<class Scalar> 
00360   class SpaceDCF: public DataContainerFactory {
00361 
00362   private:
00363 
00364     Space<Scalar> const & sp;
00365     SpaceDCF();
00366 
00367   public:
00368     
00369     SpaceDCF(Space<Scalar> const & _sp): sp(_sp) {}
00370     SpaceDCF(SpaceDCF<Scalar> const & f): sp(f.sp) {}
00371     ~SpaceDCF() {}
00372 
00373     DataContainer * build() const { return sp.buildDataContainer(); }
00374 
00375     Space<Scalar> const & getSpace() const { return sp; }
00376 
00377     bool compare( DataContainerFactory const & dcf ) const {
00378       SpaceDCF<Scalar> const * p = NULL;
00379       p = dynamic_cast< SpaceDCF<Scalar> const * >(&dcf);
00380       if (p) return (this->getSpace()==p->getSpace());
00381       return false;
00382     }
00383 
00384     bool isCompatible(DataContainer const & dc) const {
00385       return sp.isCompatible(dc);
00386     }
00387 
00388     ostream & write(ostream & str) const {
00389       str<<"Space-derived DataContainerFactory based on Space:\n";
00390       sp.write(str);
00391       return str;
00392     }
00393   };

00409   template<class Scalar>
00410   class Vector: public Writeable {
00411 
00412     friend class Components<Scalar>;
00413 
00414   private: 
00415 
00416     // the space to which the vector belongs
00417     const Space<Scalar> & sp;
00418     // the data container for the vector data
00419     // mutable to allow delayed allocation in a const member function
00420     mutable DataContainer * d; 
00421     // flags:
00422     //   own:       true if allocation of DataContainer is internal, false 
00423     //              if it's externally allocated
00424     //   initizero: initialize with all zeros if true, leave uninitialized else
00425     bool own, initzero;
00426     // reference to ver
00427     unsigned int & verref;
00428     // version index - incremented at every assignment
00429     mutable unsigned int ver;
00430 
00431     // default construction disallowed
00432     Vector();
00433 
00434   protected:
00435 
00445     /*
00446     DataContainer const * getDataContainer() const { 
00447       if( !d) {
00448     d = sp.buildDataContainer();
00449     if(initzero) sp.zero(*d);
00450       }
00451       return d; 
00452     }
00453     */
00454 
00455     DataContainer * getDataContainer() const { 
00456       if( !d) {
00457     d = sp.buildDataContainer();
00458     if(initzero) sp.zero(*d);
00459       }
00460       return d; 
00461     }
00462 
00467     Vector(const Space<Scalar> & _sp, 
00468        DataContainer * _d, 
00469        unsigned int & _verref, 
00470        bool _own = false)
00471       :sp(_sp), d(_d), own(_own), verref(_verref) {
00472       if (!(sp.isCompatible(*getDataContainer()))) {
00473     RVLException e; e<<"*** Error: Vector constructor (sp,dc)\n";
00474     e<<"*** input data container not compatible with space\n";
00475     e<<"*** this space:\n";
00476     sp.write(e);
00477     e<<"*** data container:\n";
00478     d->write(e);
00479     throw e;
00480       }
00481       ver = verref;
00482     }
00483 
00486     Vector<Scalar> * build_from_kit(const Space<Scalar> & _sp, 
00487                     DataContainer * _d, 
00488                     unsigned int & _verref, 
00489                     bool _own = false) {
00490       return new Vector<Scalar>(_sp,_d,_verref,_own);
00491     }
00492 
00496     Vector(const Vector<Scalar> * v)
00497       : sp(v->sp), d(v->d), own(false), ver(0), verref(ver) {}
00498 
00512 #ifndef RVL_OPERATOR_NEW_ENABLED
00513     void * operator new(size_t size) { 
00514       void * ptr;
00515       ptr = (void *) ::new unsigned char[size]; 
00516       return ptr;
00517     }
00518 #endif
00519     unsigned int & getVersionRef() const { return verref; }
00520     
00521   public:
00522 
00523     using RVL::Writeable::write;
00524 
00526     typedef typename ScalarFieldTraits<Scalar>::AbsType NormRetType;
00527 
00530     Vector(const Vector<Scalar> & x)
00531       : sp(x.sp), 
00532     d(sp.buildDataContainer()), 
00533     own(true), 
00534     initzero(false), 
00535     verref(ver) {
00536       try {
00537     sp.copy(*getDataContainer(),*(x.getDataContainer()));
00538     ver=0;
00539       }
00540       catch (RVLException & e) {
00541     e<<"\ncalled from Vector copy constructor\n";
00542       }
00543     }
00544 
00554     Vector(const Space<Scalar> & _sp, bool _initZero = false)
00555       : sp(_sp), d(NULL), own(true), 
00556     initzero(_initZero), verref(ver), ver(0) {}
00557   
00560     ~Vector() { if (own&&(d!=NULL)) delete d; }
00561 
00563     const Space<Scalar> & getSpace() const { return sp; }
00564 
00566     bool inSpace(const Space<Scalar> & sp1) const { return (sp==sp1); }
00569     bool inSameSpace(const Vector<Scalar> & x) const { return inSpace(x.sp); }
00570 
00577     unsigned int getVersion() const { return ver; }
00578     void incrementVersion() { 
00579       if (ver < numeric_limits<unsigned int>::max()) { ver++; }
00580       else {
00581     RVLException e;
00582     e<<"Error: Vector::incrementVersion\n";
00583     e<<"run out of unsigned ints!!!\n";
00584     throw e;
00585       }
00586     }
00587     
00589     void eval(FunctionObject & f,
00590           vector<Vector<Scalar> const *> & x) {
00591       try {
00592     vector<DataContainer const *> dx(x.size());
00593     for (size_t i=0;i<x.size();i++) {
00594       dx[i] = x[i]->getDataContainer();
00595     }
00596     (this->getDataContainer())->eval(f,dx);
00597     incrementVersion();
00598       }
00599       catch (RVLException & e) {
00600     e<<"\ncalled from Vector::eval (generic)\n";
00601     throw e;
00602       }
00603     }
00604 
00606     void eval(FunctionObject & f) {
00607       try {
00608     vector<Vector<Scalar> const *> v(0);
00609     this->eval(f,v);
00610       }
00611       catch (RVLException & e) {
00612     e<<"\n*** called from Vector::eval(fo &)\n";
00613     throw e;
00614       }
00615     }
00616 
00618     void eval(FunctionObject & f, 
00619           const Vector<Scalar> & x) {
00620       try {
00621     vector<Vector<Scalar> const *> v(1);
00622     v[0]=&x;
00623     this->eval(f,v);
00624       }
00625       catch (RVLException & e) {
00626     e<<"\n*** called from Vector::eval(fo &, vec &)\n";
00627     throw e;
00628       }
00629     }

00632     void eval(FunctionObject & f, 
00633           const Vector<Scalar> & x,

00636     vector<Vector<Scalar> const *> v(2);
00637     v[0]=&x;
00638     v[1]=&y;
00639     this->eval(f,v);
00640       }
00641       catch (RVLException & e) {
00642     e<<"\n*** called from Vector::eval(fo &, vec &, vec &)\n";
00643     throw e;
00644       }
00645     }
00646 
00648     void eval(FunctionObject & f, 
00649           const Vector<Scalar> & x,
00650           const Vector<Scalar> & y,
00651           const Vector<Scalar> & z) {
00652       try {
00653     vector<Vector<Scalar> const *> v(3);
00654     v[0]=&x;
00655     v[1]=&y;
00656     v[2]=&z;
00657     this->eval(f,v);
00658       }      
00659       catch (RVLException & e) {
00660     e<<"\n*** called from Vector::eval(fo &, vec &, vec &, vec &)\n";
00661     throw e;
00662       }
00663     }

00744     return sp.inner(*getDataContainer(),*(y.getDataContainer()));

00751 
00753     void linComb(Scalar a, const Vector<Scalar> & x,
00754          Scalar b = ScalarFieldTraits<Scalar>::One()) {
00755       try {
00756     sp.linComb(a,*(x.getDataContainer()),
00757            b,*(this->getDataContainer()));
00758     incrementVersion();
00759       }
00760       catch (RVLException & e) {
00761     e<<"\n*** called from Vector::linComb (this = a x + b this)\n";
00762     throw e;
00763       }
00764     }

00866 
00867     ostream & write(ostream & str) const {
00868       str<<"Vector Object"<<endl;
00869       str<<"member of space:"<<endl;
00870       sp.write(str);
00871       str<<"data container:"<<endl;
00872       (this->getDataContainer())->write(str);
00873       return str;

00881   template<class Scalar>
00882   class WatchedVecRef {
00883 
00884   private:
00885 
00886     Vector<Scalar> & x;
00887     mutable unsigned int ver;
00888     WatchedVecRef() {}
00889 
00890   public:
00891 
00892     WatchedVecRef(const Vector<Scalar> & _x)
00893       : x(const_cast< Vector<Scalar> & >(_x)), 
00894     ver(x.getVersion()) {}
00895     WatchedVecRef(const WatchedVecRef<Scalar> & w)
00896       : x(w.x), ver(w.x.getVersion()) {}
00897     virtual ~WatchedVecRef() {}
00898 
00899     Vector<Scalar> & get() { return x; }
00900     Vector<Scalar> const & get() const { return x; }
00901 
00902     bool update() const {
00903       try {
00904     if (ver < x.getVersion()) {
00905       ver = x.getVersion();
00906       return true;
00907     }
00908     return false;
00909       }
00910       catch (RVLException & e) {
00911     e<<"\ncalled from WatchedVecRef::update\n";
00912     throw e;
00913       }
00914     }
00915   };
00916 
00920   template<typename Scalar> 
00921   void SpaceTest(Space<Scalar> const & sp, 
00922          Vector<Scalar> const & v,
00923          std::string msg) {
00924     if (!v.inSpace(sp)) {
00925       RVLException e; 
00926       e<<"Error: "<<msg<<"\n";
00927       e<<"vector not in space\n";
00928       e<<"vector:\n";
00929       v.write(e);
00930       e<<"space:\n";
00931       sp.write(e);
00932       throw e;
00933     }
00934   }
00935 
00936 }
00937 
00938 #endif
